recent.change:
Russian translation provided by IDris a.k.a. MANsur, Ghost-Unit (Идрис a.k.a. Мансур) https://play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=IDris+a.k.a.+MANsur,+Ghost-Unit http://tapp.ru/
If you would like to donate a translation please visit the 'Getting Involved' page on the ZipSigner website and send me an email.
Fixed divide-by-zero error when signing with private keys Renamed the app from "ZipSigner 2" to just "ZipSigner"
Fixed the button display issue on 400x800 hdpi devices with the holo theme Updated Chinese translations
Fixed an issue in which zero-length entries in the zip were not zipaligned. Added fingerprint and key hash display to the key properties screen. UI now uses the default theme for the device.
